column1: Smoque BBQ////I've never eaten here in person
column2: but whenever one of my friends hosts a party
column3: Smoque is the place of choice for informal get-togethers. They have been pretty consistent with the taste and quality
column4: which is alot to say when you have to feed 10-20 people. I am a fan of their dry rub ribs
column5: no so much of their pulled pork
column6: which tastes overcooked. The brisket is nicely done and juicy
column7: and the mac-n-cheese puts the store variety to shame. One of these days I will get around to going there in person
column9: my ribs come in a pan. Yes
